name: RemoveWatermarkFromFolder
description:
Removes the watermark from a specified folder.

Use this tool to remove the watermark from a folder by providing the folder's ID in the request.

parameters.name: folder_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a folder. This ID can be found in the URL when visiting the folder in the Box web application. For instance, in `https://*.app.box.com/folder/123`, the `folder_id` is `123`. The root folder is always `0`.

value_schema.description:
The unique identifier that represent a folder.

The ID for any folder can be determined
by visiting this folder in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/folder/123`
the `folder_id` is `123`.

The root folder of a Box account is
always represented by the ID `0`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
